question: Which union ministry has organised the Fit India Plog run?
option1: Ministry of Youth Affairs And Sports
option2: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
option4: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
answer: Ministry of Youth Affairs And Sports
explanation: Union Sports Minister Kiren Rijiju has flagged off  the nation-wide \'Fit India Plog run’ at Indira Gandhi stadium in New Delhi to mark 150th Gandhi Jayanti. Plogging is a concept brings together fitness and cleanliness as participants pick up plastic and other waste from the road while jogging. The run is being organised at over two thousand places all over the country including 225 places in the national capital.
